channel.title: 2015 on Jun Woo Shin
channel.description: Recent content in 2015 on Jun Woo Shin

item.title: New Computer
item.description: I’ve always been into computers, but interestingly enough I never bought a good one that I actually wanted.

item.title: Why doesn't my school encourage learning?
item.description: I’m a freshman in NYU Tandon School of Engineering. As a computer science major, I was excited to find that I would be taking Python in my first semester, a language that I had some experience with already.

item.title: Diceware
item.description: GitHub: diceware Demo: N/A After reading an article about a little girl making diceware passwords and selling them, I became interested in automating that process.

item.title: Spread Too Thin
item.description: Ever since I could remember, I was always so ambitious. There were so many things that I wanted to do and so many things that I wanted to learn.

item.title: GitHub Blog
item.description: I’ve been meaning to make blog using GitHub’s built in system using Jekyll. But of course I got distracted and never quite got around to it.

item.title: Geocoder
item.description: GitHub: geocoder Demo: https://jwoos.github.io/web_geocoder/ I was playing around with Google’s location API, when I found the geocoding API.
